title: FILTER CONFIGURATION COMMAND
description:
See IHUB Router Configurations and Routing Protocols Guide for more 
information. The command can be accessed and executed by operators with filter 
privileges.
user_level: The command can be executed by operators with filter privileges.
raw:
help configure filter
FILTER CONFIGURATION COMMAND
============================

Command Description
-------------------

See IHUB Router Configurations and Routing Protocols Guide for more 
information. The command can be accessed and executed by operators with filter 
privileges.


User Level
----------

The command can be executed by operators with filter privileges.

Command Syntax
--------------

The command has the following syntax:
> configure filter

Command Parameters
------------------

none
DS-LIN-TEST-01:automationuser>#
